ERTextFormatXMLAttribute.Name: listAgencyName
ERTextFormatXMLAttribute.Value: United Nations Economic Commission for Europe

ERFormatComponentPropertyBinding.ExpressionAsString:
CASE(Invoice.InvoiceBase.CountryContext,
"DK", IF(AND(Invoice.LineItem.LineBase.Quantity>0,0>Invoice.LineItem.LineBase.Amount,Invoice.SalesOrderBalance>0), -Invoice.LineItem.LineBase.Quantity, IF(AND(Invoice.LineItem.LineBase.Quantity>0,0>Invoice.LineItem.LineBase.Amount,0>Invoice.SalesOrderBalance), Invoice.LineItem.LineBase.Quantity, ABS(Invoice.LineItem.LineBase.Quantity)) ),
"NO", IF(AND(Invoice.LineItem.LineBase.Quantity > 0, Invoice.SalesOrderBalance < 0), -Invoice.LineItem.LineBase.Quantity, Invoice.LineItem.LineBase.Quantity),
"AT", IF(AND(Invoice.LineItem.LineBase.Quantity>0,0>Invoice.LineItem.LineBase.Amount,Invoice.SalesOrderBalance>0), -Invoice.LineItem.LineBase.Quantity, IF(AND(Invoice.LineItem.LineBase.Quantity>0,0>Invoice.LineItem.LineBase.Amount,0>Invoice.SalesOrderBalance), Invoice.LineItem.LineBase.Quantity, -Invoice.LineItem.LineBase.Quantity )),
Invoice.LineItem.LineBase.Quantity)
